summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Terrace Street, in the City of Seattle, from Broadway to Eleventh Avenue, by constructing concrete walks and woodencross walks, in accordance with Resolution No. 761 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
